title: Mission rewards
body: So I completed on of the lunar year missions and the rewards for it were the read envelope and an emote called Squeal. I was prompted that I got the rewards but I just got the envelope. I looked at my emotes and loot but the emote was nowhere to be found. Is there any reason for this or?

replies.body: Emotes usually are bugged and need a relog to show up after you've unlocked it. You should see it on your next login!
any eta on a fix for that problem? seems like it's a long running one (world, maybe before?)
No ETA but I know teams are aware of it.
